content: Nessuno Ã¨ troppo vecchio per imparare.
translations: eng:It is never too late to learn
eng:It's never too late to learn
eng:No man is so old he cannot learn
eng:No one is so old but he can learn
eng:No one is too old to learn
eng:Nobody is too old to learn
eng:One is never too old to learn
eng:You will never be too old to learn
eng:You're never too old to learn
